languages.text: "Слова срываются с ваших уст и обжигают окружающих ядовито-зелеными всполохами, но после оседают в вашей собственной душе серым пеплом. Знаете, чем больше пепла в чьем-то сердце, тем быстрее он сам теряет человечность".

traits.locale_text: "Слова срываются с ваших уст и обжигают окружающих ядовито-зелеными всполохами, но после оседают в вашей собственной душе серым пеплом. Знаете, чем больше пепла в чьем-то сердце, тем быстрее он сам теряет человечность".

languages.text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."
languages.original_text: "Слова срываются с ваших уст и обжигают окружающих ядовито-зелеными всполохами, но после оседают в вашей собственной душе серым пеплом. Знаете, чем больше пепла в чьем-то сердце, тем быстрее он сам теряет человечность".

traits.locale_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch with the flares of shrilly green, but then settle down in your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in somebody's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

"The words fly off your tongue and scorch with the flares of shrilly green, but then settle down in your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in somebody's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

"The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

"The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

"The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

languages.text: “你吐出的这些话，仿佛带着火花的绿色毒液一样，腐蚀着你身边的每个人。随后，它们又化成了铅色的灰烬，沉淀在你的灵魂之中。如你所知，一个人心中的灰烬越多，人性泯灭的速度就越快。”
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: “你吐出的这些话，仿佛带着火花的绿色毒液一样，腐蚀着你身边的每个人。随后，它们又化成了铅色的灰烬，沉淀在你的灵魂之中。如你所知，一个人心中的灰烬越多，人性泯灭的速度就越快。”

languages.text: «Las palabras vuelan de tu lengua y queman a todos los que te rodean con chispas de un verde ponzoñoso, pero después se depositan en tu alma como una ceniza de plomo. Cuanta más ceniza haya en tu corazón, más rápido pierdes tu propia humanidad».
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras vuelan de tu lengua y queman a todos los que te rodean con chispas de un verde ponzoñoso, pero después se depositan en tu alma como una ceniza de plomo. Cuanta más ceniza haya en tu corazón, más rápido pierdes tu propia humanidad».

languages.text: 「その舌から飛び立った言葉は、有毒な緑の火花とともにあなたを囲む者すべてを焦がし、鉛色の灰としてあなたの魂に染み付きます。そう、心に積もる灰が多いほど、人間らしさを失うのも早いのです」
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「その舌から飛び立った言葉は、有毒な緑の火花とともにあなたを囲む者すべてを焦がし、鉛色の灰としてその魂にこびりつきます。そう、心に積もる灰が多いほど、人間らしさを失うのも早いのですよ」
「その舌から飛び立った言葉は、有毒な緑の火花とともにあなたを囲む者すべてを焦がし、鉛色の灰としてあなたの魂に染み付きます。そう、心に積もる灰が多いほど、人間らしさを失うのも早いのです」

languages.text: « Vos paroles s'envolent de votre langue et brûlent tout le monde autour de vous avec des étincelles d'un vert toxique, qui retombent ensuite sur votre âme sous forme de lourdes cendres. Et plus les cendres recouvrent le cœur d'une personne, plus celle-ci perd son humanité. »
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles s'envolent de votre langue et brûlent tout le monde autour de vous avec des étincelles d'un vert toxique, qui retombent ensuite sur votre âme sous forme de lourdes cendres. Et plus les cendres recouvrent le cœur d'une personne, plus celle-ci perd son humanité. »

languages.text: "Die Worte fliegen von Eurer Zunge und vergiften alle um Euch herum mit giftgrünen Funken, die sich dann als bleierne Asche auf Eurer Seele absetzen. Und je mehr Asche jemand im Herzen trägt, desto schneller verliert er seine eigene Menschlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte fliegen von Eurer Zunge und vergiften alle um Euch herum mit giftgrünen Funken, die sich dann als bleierne Asche auf Eurer Seele absetzen. Und je mehr Asche jemand im Herzen trägt, desto schneller verliert er seine eigene Menschlichkeit."

languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

languages.text: "Sözcükler dilinden çıkıp uçuşuyor; etrafındaki herkesi zehirli, yeşil kıvılcımlar misali kavuruyor ancak ardından da kurşuni bir kül suretinde ruhuna yerleşiyorlar. Birinin kalbinde ne kadar çok kül yer ederse o kişi, insanlığını o kadar hızlı yitirir."
languages.original_text: "The words fly off your tongue and scorch everyone around you with sparks of venomous green, but then they settle on your soul as leaden ash. You know, the more ash there is in someone's heart, the faster they lose their own humanity."

traits.locale_text: "Sözcükler dilinden çıkıp uçuşuyor; etrafındaki herkesi zehirli, yeşil kıvılcımlar misali kavuruyor ancak ardından da kurşuni bir kül suretinde ruhuna yerleşiyorlar. Birinin kalbinde ne kadar çok kül yer ederse o kişi, insanlığını o kadar hızlı yitirir."
